# Introduction
```{r, fig.align = 'center',out.width= '40%', echo=FALSE }
knitr::include_graphics(path = "figures/nt_base_colours.png", auto_pdf = TRUE)
``` 

This practical session aims to introduce you to Illumina Quality Control. The topics covered are:

- [Logging in to our teaching environment](#cluster)
- [Acquiring the workshop data](#data)
- [Quality control of good quality genomic data](#goodtutorial)
- [Quality control of poor quality genomic data](#poortutorial)
- [Quality control of Whole genome shotgun data](#shotgun)
- [Quality control of 16S rRNA metagenetic data](#metagenetics)
